FuncDef:
The web-server mode command configures an HTTP working mode for a web server.
The undo web-server mode command restores the default working mode for a web server.
The default working mode for a web server is get.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the working mode is get.
-

Indicates that the working mode is post.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
HTTP redirection is used to block user or service traffic after user or service quotas are exhausted. Users' HTTP requests are redirected to a specified page (a recharge page usually). To configure an HTTP working mode for a web server, run the web-server mode command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
